body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<polUni>
        <fvTenant name="test1_tenant">
		<vzBrCP name="test1_contract" status="created,modified">
			<vzSubj name="test1_subject" status="created,modified" revFltPorts="no">
				<vzRsSubjFiltAtt directives="" tnVzFilterName="http" status="created,modified"/>
				<vzRsSubjFiltAtt directives="" tnVzFilterName="https" status="created,modified"/>
			</vzSubj>
		</vzBrCP>
	</fvTenant>
</polUni>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<polUni>
	<fvTenant name="test1_tenant">
		<vzFilter  name="http" status="created,modified" >
			<vzEntry descr="" etherT="IP" name="tcp_80" applyToFrag="no" arpOpc="unspecified" dFromPort="unspecified" dToPort="unspecified" icmpv4T="unspecified" icmpv6T="unspecified" matchDscp="unspecified" nameAlias="" prot="unspecified" sFromPort="unspecified" sToPort="unspecified" stateful="no" tcpRules="" status="created,modified"/>
		</vzFilter>
		<vzFilter  name="https" status="created,modified" >
			<vzEntry descr="" etherT="IP" name="tcp_443" applyToFrag="no" arpOpc="unspecified" dFromPort="unspecified" dToPort="unspecified" icmpv4T="unspecified" icmpv6T="unspecified" matchDscp="unspecified" nameAlias="" prot="unspecified" sFromPort="unspecified" sToPort="unspecified" stateful="no" tcpRules="" status="created,modified"/>
		</vzFilter>
	</fvTenant>
</polUni>
